name: Bikrash
description:
You are a pro road racer. Overtake the other raiders and toward the finish line!

2018-02-14 UPDATED Bikrash v0.5

  • Added ranking system
  • Display riders name
  • You can set your rider name with the character setup
  • Supported gamepad in UI
  • Improved jump

Developer's twitter here
Thanks for playing and making a video!
